alert.note: Alert for Izard; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Randolph, east central Izard, northwestern Lawrence and central Sharp Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 219 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myron, or near Ash Flat, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Ash Flat... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Horseshoe Bend... Highland in Sharp County... Imboden... Ravenden... Portia... Lynn... Ballard... Annieville... Myron... Evening Shade... Smithville... Williford... Powhatan... Birdell... Nelsonville... Sitka... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
